meanings.definition: Excessive in relation to something else.
meanings.sent1: The cake had an overproportionate amount of frosting on top.
meanings.sent2: Her excitement was overproportionate to the news she received.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's overproportionate tail wagging made everyone in the room smile.
meanings.sent4: The overproportionate size of the gift box hinted at something extraordinary inside.
meanings.sent5: The overproportionate laughter from the audience showed how much they enjoyed the comedian's jokes.

meanings.sent1: The overproportionate size of the chair made it impossible to fit through the door.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting looked overproportionate due to the elongated limbs of the subjects.
meanings.sent3: The overproportionate number of balloons in the room made it feel like a carnival.
meanings.sent4: The overproportionate shadows cast by the streetlights created a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The overproportionate amount of toppings on the pizza made it difficult to pick up a slice.
